item.title: How to Use Focus Sessions in the Microsoft Windows Clock (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Edit Focus Session Length: With Click With Keyboard With Right Click With Keyboard Shortcuts With Settings With Default Length How to Set the Number of Breaks in a Focus Session How to Set Break Length in a Focus Session How to Customize End of Session Sound How to Customize End of Break Sound How to Integrate Focus Sessions With Spotify No time to scroll down? Click through this tutorial presentation:
